You want to help the wiki and you do not know where to begin? Here are a few suggestions:
{{note|Due to relentless spambot activity, account creation had to be disabled. Sorry. You can obtain an account by contacting one of the [[Special:ListUsers|wiki admins]] on another platform (ZDoom forums, Doomworld forums, Discord channel, etc.) with an email address at which the wiki software can send you your temporary password.}}
How to help:
* Follow [[Wiki documentation guide]] when editing or adding new pages. * Create pages for ZDoom mods! Don't forget to follow the [[WAD Page Guidelines]], though. Or write articles and upload screenshots for the mods that have just the wad template and no true article. * Clean up the pages that [[:Category:Cleanup|need to be updated]]. * Don't forget to use the [[Useful templates|handy templates]] that make maintenance easier. * Add an accurate description to the actor pages that [[:Category:Actors which need a description|need a description]]. * Update the class pages! They often contain outdated information. Most importantly, add [[ZScript]] definitions to actor pages that still only have [[DECORATE]] ones. The most up-to-date code can be found on [https://github.com/ZDoom/gzdoom/tree/e7a79b0d448759b8cfe51e325f8a0b36cf340041/wadsrc/static/zscript GZDoom GitHub repository]. * If an external link is dead or broken, report it in the article's talk page or in the {{forum|ZDoom wiki thread|t=20573}}. * Likewise, if the information in an article is lacking or hard to find. * Just browse around and fix grammar and spelling mistakes where you can see them.
